name: Cute and Cruel
nutshell:
I said, "Can't we just call each other by our first name?"
This is a small Yuri story.
It is a sequel, but it is a complete piece so you can read just this book.

name: City of the Dead Sorcerer
nutshell:
The year is 2014, a new substance, SDE01, commonly referred to as "Mana" is discovered by a group of Russian scientists. The world plunges into a development race to find uses of this new seemingly unlimited source of energy that cannot be seen or felt.
16 years after the discovery, it's now the self-proclaimed Age of Magic, where you can download an App to your very phone and cast magic. However, heavy restrictions have been imposed over the available spells, and the required paperwork to even use a high level spell are astronomic.
Among the citizens of this new world, a red robed mysterious man seems capable of wielding extremely powerful magic in a way that should not be possible. It's unknown what his aim is or what he wants to accomplish. All that's known about this mysterious person is that he has been using forbidden level spells to kill evil-doers throughout the city.
But detective Kim is in charge of catching this murderer/hero. And he doesn't plan on giving up.

name: Gyeongseong In-House
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: DoEun, the leader of the loyalist party and serial-dater, has a new mission. In order to infiltrate the house of the country's enemy, Seo MoonTaek, DoEun approaches JangHan, MoonTaek's son, but… "What? A romantic relationship regardless of gender?" Where is DoEun's 100th relationship headed?

name: Genshi-san
nutshell:
Genshi-san
Reigata Shuujutsu
Tatari
Economic Animal
Wa ga Tousou: Boku no Shugorei
Genkaku no Imashime
Youkai Makuragaeshi
Atarashii Tabiji
Shuudensha no Onna

name: Happy Epicurean
nutshell:
Five different- very different- stories.
But all are tragedies with a twist at the end.
Some may have cut-off endings;
but there's a true philosophy at the end.
First story- Two cuts of the devil
About a mood-obsessed girl, a crazy count, the girl's servant- and a cup of chocolate tea.
Second story- Mr Laurence's dilemma
About a tax collector who goes to Scotland to collect the whiskey and Scotland's rebellious yet ingenuous way of protecting it. Or do they really not know?
Third story- The sultan's dialiah
An emperor has sacrificed a daughter for the sake of peace between his country Bizantin and the Sultan- the lord-'s country. He dies, but what of his daughter?
Fourth story- Scary bread
About a Christian that attempts to 'teach' the vikings. But as time grows the Christian grows weary, for she is doing something very wrong and she knows it.
Fifth story- Happy Epicurean
About a little boy who can otherwise be known as a carnivore…

name: Secret Core
nutshell:
The noble son is soon to be split apart from his family. He, who is regarded as the prince's future wife, is secretly in love with the imperial guard Ye Mo…
Ye Mo was born rebellious and is not afraid of challenging his fate, leading to an eventful and unbridled life!
What is more important to them, their family's interests or the heart's desire? How do you choose between a carefree life and a life of great achievements? What will become of this 'secret love'?
Scanlation: Watermelonely scans

name: Shinai naru F e - Opera-za no Kaijin
nutshell:
In the mysterious Paris of the 19th century, the Opera House is famous for its great plays and shows.
However, no one imagines that behind that place where everyone lives magical moments, hides a ghost so terrifying that the fifth box of the theater is forbidden to all the cast. "F", a ghost whom everyone fears, lives surrounded by rumors about his existence. However... not everyone believes in it. Christina Dae, a chorus girl with a voice like no other, refuses to consider that such a thing could exist, even though a part of her thinks that not everything said about "F" is real. Therefore, Christina is not afraid to go to practice and walk where no one else does. What if those rumors about that mysterious ghost were real?

name: Onimiya-sensei no Kisu ni wa Sakaraenai
nutshell:
A poor high school girl, Moka has to work for her living everyday. The rescue came from her admired teacher, Onimiya-sensei, but… Sensei’s true self is a sadist!? what will her life be now~!?
Pt-Br:
Ficar com um professor sádico!? Moka, uma pobre estudante do ensino médio, tem de trabalhar todo dia para viver. O resgate veio de seu admirado Professor, Onimiya, mas…. A verdade é que o sensei é um sádico!? O que ela fará de sua vida agora?

name: Koufuku Daibu
nutshell:
Contains 4 oneshots:


Koufuku Dive ｢幸福ダイブ｣


Poison Angel ｢ポイズン エンゼル｣


Kurogane Girl ｢ク� ガネ ガール｣


Majo Mao! ｢マジョマオ！｣
-taken from Manga Zone Scans
Mao (a witch) comes to the human world in search of a cell phone containing the souls of 1000 demons. In order to find the phone, she enrolls in a high school, where she meets Kento, a boy who refuses to believe in the existence of witches!

name: Can't See Can't Hear But Love
tags: Award Winning,Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A love story between a blind man and a deaf woman.

name: Camera no Mukou de Mesu ni Naru
nutshell: Popular adult film director Kyoichi, who specializes in drag queens, hits the streets to scout fresh meat for his new movie. He comes across Nao, who's in tears after being rejected by a girl. While he's clearly just a regular guy, Nao's pretty features are leagues above the men who usually star in Kyoichi's films. Kyoichi is enthralled and determines to put Nao in his new movie. Hiding his true intentions, he approaches Nao and convinces him to try on women's clothing. Nao finds himself getting excited at the unusual situation and Kyoichi's constant flattery…! An innocent, unsuspecting Nao starts to understand the joy of being loved as a woman…

name: Bishoujo Doujin Sakka to Wakagashira
nutshell:
At the debut sale of the amateur writer's "Banana Unco Pakupaku" during a Dōjinshi fare, the first one who came to buy a copy and give her a pretty ~♥, turned out to be none other than an actual crime underboss.
Now at the mercy of various Yakuza, will the young author be able to continue her work safely without any threat to her life?

name: Classmate Relationship?
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: By chance, Fang Tang came across Ah Shu, someone he noticed long ago. The two became classmates and intimate friends. A refreshing and pure love school life manhua.

name: Hitorijime ~Choukyou Ganbou~
nutshell: Masahiro's parents have remarried and he is supposed to live with them, and a honor student Rei, who is in the same class with Masahiro, thinks "that a guy who thinks nothing but sex shouldn't be allowed to live together." Her words enrage Masahiro and he began to distance himself from her and on that moment, an unexpected reaction from Rei…?

name: Imperial Soul
nutshell: The so-called Soul Emperor uses blood to train the soul, and spirit to control the soul of the soul to pass the world. He came to this world from 1700 years ago, and what will he do?

name: Itsuwari no Ai wo Haramu
nutshell: Tu tendrás al hijo de la familia Saionji". Un encuentro casual en una fiesta se llegan a conocer Rio (Ω) y Takato Saioji(α). Este ultimo miembro de una distinguida familia y con una personalidad arrogante, hace que Rio no lo vea con buenos ojos, pero que aun así es obligado a vivir y a ser la pareja de este arrogante alfa.

name: The Phoenix
nutshell:
This is a war between humans and monsters. The grievances and hatreds of the world are annihilated. Travel the world alone for one thousand years. He is waiting for the return of Phoenix…
Source: MangaToon

name: Colorful Macchiato! -Mahou Shoujo wa Tatakawanai.-
nutshell: When she got into a pinch on the day of her high school entrance ceremony, Momose Minori transformed into a magical girl! Together with her classmate Shiori, will she join the magical girl club her seniors founded…?

name: The Tale of Goldiluck, the Black Kitten
tags: Historical,Animals,Long Strip,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell:
A sweet tale of companionship and found family set in Joseon dynasty Korea between a lonely young scholar with a kind but weak heart, a stray black kitten with a strange secret, and a loyal but jealous servant boy.



Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>


Original Webtoon <Comico>


Original Webtoon <Naver>


Original Webtoon <kakao>





Original Book <Yes24>


Original Book <Aladin>

name: Yamada to Shounen
nutshell:
On Christmas night, on his way home from work, Yamada (age 26) picked up the drunk and crying high schooler Chihiro - a boy worried about his attraction to those of the same sex… A straight working man, and a gay high school student. In this long-awaited work from artist Ori Mito, a spontaneous meeting between two people blooms into a romance that transcends gender.
This series has been published in Japan since 2013 which Japanese title name is "Yamada to Shounen"
Available in English:
Amazon Kindle
Book Walker
Comixology
Google Play
Kobo
NOOK

name: Physician Princess
nutshell: A modern medical doctor and kickboxing trainer was reincarnated in the body of an 11-year-old girl as the eldest daughter of the Xie family. In order to survive, the little girl waged a battle with her closest family members. After the bloody war, she was informed of her wedding contract with a handicapped person who was no different from a eunuch. All that was hidden from her by her father, which led to the little girl’s demise in the wilderness, where the reincarnation took place.

name: Crayon Kingdom Of Dreams
nutshell:
Silver, the princess of the Crayon Kingdom, is well-known for her beautiful smile... and for having lots of flaws. Twelve, to be exact.
When misfortune strikes the kingdom, she sets out on a journey with her two companions, Araessa and Stonston.
Will she manage to get rid of her flaws and save the kingdom?

name: Asirhart Kingdom Aide
nutshell:
“Would you like to become the Princess of Asirhart?”
Mia Sihit, the bread-winner of her family from a defeated nation becomes the Princess’s substitute for the war powerhouse nation of Asirhart.
Princess Rivel who left all of a sudden after installing the Princess’s substitute,
And The Royal Honorary Knight’s suspicion of Mia all the while helping her!
Life inside the palace does not come easy for Mia as she tries to understand the new surrounding she found herself in.
The “Disaster” that is swiping across the continent has finally reached the door of Asirhart nation and inside the palace, Mia discovered a huge secret…
“If so, what is my destiny?”
Following the growth of Mia, the Princess’s substitute facing her destiny in an ever-perishing world!

name: Sore wo Koi to Yobazuni Nanto Iu
nutshell:
From Peach Kyoudai:
Kouki had secretly loved Haru-nii, who used to live in the neighborhood when he was young. Five years later, despite Kouki making up his mind to move on, he unexpectedly gets reunited with Haru-nii as neighbors!
Although being invited to dinner or accidentally meeting outside gave him joy, Kouki couldn't help but feel dejected every time Haru-nii treated him like his younger brother. On top of that, the more they spent time together, his supposedly forgotten feelings bubble up even more!

name: The Seiten Wars Flieder Bug
nutshell: Energy crisis, scarcity of resources, etc. Leads to its only logical conclusion: war between east and west.

name: Kazekou Engekibu!
nutshell: Much to her embarrassement, the shy Mashio-chan wins a set of couple tickets for the amusement park. She feels at a loss for what to do since she has always been bad with men. So what will happen to her when the drama club president Katokura Aki suddenly declares that he would erase her awareness…?

name: Hetalia - Ley Line (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: USA/UK.

name: Trinity Seven: Liese Chronicle
nutshell: The story centers on Lieselotte Sherlock, an evil mage from the original manga

name: Anata o Ajiwaitai
nutshell:
Mai is working part-time as a home tutor. Ritsu, her student's high school brother, tells her "Teach me too" and they learn using their bodies. Mai is completely addicted… First-rate pleasure is bittersweet. The end of that is…?!
A collection of short stories.

name: Full Moon
nutshell: Ever since ancient times, there have existed people who prevent the darkness of the night from swelling… They are the sorcerers, the only ones who have the power to oppose the darkness!

name: Yuki no Shita no Qualia
nutshell: Akio and Umi live in the same student hostel. While Akio tends to avoid people, Umi is a connoisseur of the one-night stand. Still, with time they begin to seek each other out in order to deal with their pasts.
